definitions: The act of creating a physical or abstract representation of an object or system.
The act of displaying or wearing clothes or other products as a fashion model.
The act of shaping or forming a material, such as clay.
The act of demonstrating a particular behavior for others to imitate.
examples: She is modeling a new dress for the catalog.
The architect is modeling the building in 3D.
He is modeling the clay into a vase.
Parents are modeling good behavior for their children.
